extendedInfo.description: âââââââââââââââââââââââ50% Promotional Sales! Limited Time Only!âââââââââââââââââââââââPsychology is the science of behavior and mental processes. Its immediate goal is to understand individuals and groups by both establishing general principles and researching specific cases.While psychological knowledge is often applied to the assessment and treatment of mental health problems, it is also applied to understanding and solving problems in many different spheres of human activity. Although the majority of psychologists are involved in some kind of therapeutic role (clinical, counseling, and school positions), many do scientific research on a wide range of topics related to mental processes and behavior (typically in university psychology departments) or teach such knowledge in academic settings; and some are employed in industrial and organizational settings, and in other areas such as human development and aging, sports, health, the media, law, and forensics.Glossary of Psychology is an application containing over 2500 psychology-related terms and technical jargon. This App is an excellent App for psychologist as well as students who are in the field of psychology and those want to learn more about the human mind.The application is optimized for all Android devices running on OS 1.5 or above.âââââââââââââââââââââââFEATURESThis application has the following features:â User friendly interface to preview all terms in one viewâ Ability to bookmark selected term for easier referenceâ Cross-referencing links to other termâ A psychology terms search engineâ Offline browsingâââââââââââââââââââââââThis application is brought to you by Colakey LLC.
